definition: reversal/inversion/to reverse/to invert (upside down, inside out, back to front, white to black etc)
contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: I find the term Inversion of Control too all-encompassing.
sentences.chinese: 我发现控制反转这个术语的包含面太广。

sentences.english: Fifth, the paper studies TRM passive localization with vector hydrophone.
sentences.chinese: 第五，矢量水听器时间反转镜被动定位技术研究。

sentences.english: How can food and nutrients reverse the aging process?
sentences.chinese: 食物和营养素如何反转衰老进程？

sentences.english: Blending with white inverts the base color values.
sentences.chinese: 与白色混合将反转基色值。

sentences.english: Marinate the chicken for 1 hour, turning occassionally.
sentences.chinese: 鸡用腌料腌1小时，间中反转。

sentences.english: NOTSRCERASE Inverts the result of combining the destination and source bitmaps using the Boolean OR operator.
sentences.chinese: 反转使用布尔OR操作符合并源和目标位图的结果。

sentences.english: Gastric fundus disease was diagnosed by method of U-type reverse gastroscope biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 采用前视型胃镜，利用U型反转法活检胃底病变。

sentences.english: But when foods are processed, that ratio is usually flipped.
sentences.chinese: 但食物在加工的过程中，钠钾盐的比例就会反转。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the reverse tectonic activities produced numerous small anticlines during the late period of the Minghuazhen Formation developing.
sentences.chinese: 明化镇组晚期反转构造形成了众多的小背斜。

sentences.english: GDV is an emergency condition requiring immediate veterinary treatment.
sentences.chinese: 胃扩张肠反转是很危急的情况，需要兽医立即治疗。

sentences.english: Awake is an illusion of the shallow sleep, give up is the inversion of obsession.
sentences.chinese: 清醒是浅眠的幻觉，放弃是反转的执念。

sentences.english: The structures can be divided into 2 kinds: single type and composite type.
sentences.chinese: 正反转构造可分为单一型和复合型2大类。

sentences.english: This scenario is a classic case of priority inversion.
sentences.chinese: 这个情景是一个经典的优先级反转案例。

sentences.english: The harami pattern established on Fri and has now been confirmed today as a bullish reversal.
sentences.chinese: 上周5建立的孕育形态现在已经证明是一个牛市反转。

sentences.english: Fits any reversible power tool and air tool.
sentences.chinese: 适用于任何可反转的电动工具及气动工具。

sentences.english: Never reverse rotary table into the DC or any tubular when making up connections.
sentences.chinese: 永远不要反转转盘为钻铤和管子上扣。

definition: shift in the trend of events/turnaround/plot shift in a book/turn in the conversation
to bounce/to bounce back/to boomerang/to ricochet/rebound (of stock market etc)/bounce/backlash/negative repercussions
bull market (prices appear to be rising)
to shake up/to jolt/to vibrate/to oscillate/to fluctuate
turning point/breaking point/inflexion point (math., a point of a curve at which the curvature changes sign)
to continue to fall (of share prices)
market price/quotation of market price/the current market situation
